New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest bowler to reach 100 ODI wickets
Fakhar Zaman scored 81 runs, setting up Pakistan's win
Key Match Events: Pakistan's early wickets set the tone
Fakhar Zaman and Abdullah Shafique's 128-run partnership
Litton Das' dismissal turned the innings around
Pakistan's late-order boundaries sealed the win
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan needed a win to keep faint hopes alive
Shaheen Shah Afridi's performance was pivotal from the first over
Post-Match Reflections: The win boosted Pakistan's confidence and net run rate
Players expressed pride in the team's resilience
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
